alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 15 at 8:03PM CDT until April 17 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River NEAR White Oak Park Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River NEAR White Oak Park. * WHEN...Until Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 2.0 feet, Minor flooding of Goos Ferry Road will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:35 PM CDT Friday the stage was 1.9 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate above flood stage with a maximum value of 2.0 feet just after midnight tonight. It will fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 2.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Calcasieu River White Oak Park 2.0 1.9 Fri 7 pm CDT 1.8 1.7 1.6 &&
